name: indianan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Indiana: His wife's an Indianan, and they were married in Indianapolis. See also
Hoosier
More examplesFewer examples William Henry Harrison was the Indianan who was the hero of the 1811 Battle of Tippecanoe.He was an Indianan who served as Democratic Party chairman during the Clinton administration. The Senator praised his fellow Indianan.According to stereotype, Indianans are wary of change.

belonging or relating to the US state of Indiana or its people: the Indianan city of South Bend See also
Hoosier
More examplesFewer examplesDo you think picking an Indianan running mate would help him in the state?
